body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Invoice xmlns:cac="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:CommonAggregateComponents-2"
    xmlns:cbc="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:CommonBasicComponents-2"
    xmlns="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:Invoice-2">
    <cbc:CustomizationID>urn:cen.eu:en16931:2017#compliant#urn:fdc:peppol.eu:2017:poacc:billing:3.0</cbc:CustomizationID>
    <cbc:ProfileID>urn:fdc:peppol.eu:2017:poacc:billing:01:1.0</cbc:ProfileID>
    <!-- ID has to be unique for every invoice from a given supplier in a client -->
    <cbc:ID>{{invoiceNumber}}</cbc:ID>
    <cbc:IssueDate>{{cIssueDate}}</cbc:IssueDate>
    <cbc:DueDate>{{cDueDate}}</cbc:DueDate>
    <!-- comment -->
    <cbc:InvoiceTypeCode>380</cbc:InvoiceTypeCode>
    <cbc:DocumentCurrencyCode>NOK</cbc:DocumentCurrencyCode>
    <!-- comment -->
    <cbc:BuyerReference>Test Controller</cbc:BuyerReference>
    <!-- comment -->
    <cac:InvoicePeriod>
        <cbc:StartDate>2020-08-12</cbc:StartDate>
        <cbc:EndDate>2020-08-30</cbc:EndDate>
    </cac:InvoicePeriod>


    <cac:AccountingSupplierParty>
        <cac:Party>
            <cbc:EndpointID schemeID="0192">{{cSupplierCode-A}}</cbc:EndpointID>
            <cac:PartyName>
                <cbc:Name>name-{{cSupplierCode-A}}</cbc:Name>
            </cac:PartyName>
            <cac:PostalAddress>
                <cbc:CityName>City</cbc:CityName>
                <cbc:PostalZone>Zip-SP-9999</cbc:PostalZone>
                <cac:Country>
                    <cbc:IdentificationCode>NO</cbc:IdentificationCode>
                </cac:Country>
            </cac:PostalAddress>
            <cac:PartyTaxScheme>
                <cbc:CompanyID>NO{{cSupplierCode-A}}MVA</cbc:CompanyID>
                <cac:TaxScheme>
                    <cbc:ID>VAT</cbc:ID>
                </cac:TaxScheme>
            </cac:PartyTaxScheme>
            <cac:PartyTaxScheme>
                <cbc:CompanyID>Foretaksregisteret</cbc:CompanyID>
                <cac:TaxScheme>
                    <cbc:ID>TAX</cbc:ID>
                </cac:TaxScheme>
            </cac:PartyTaxScheme>
            <cac:PartyLegalEntity>
                <cbc:RegistrationName>RegistrationName-{{cSupplierCode-A}}</cbc:RegistrationName>
                <cbc:CompanyID schemeID="0192">{{cSupplierCode-A}}</cbc:CompanyID>
            </cac:PartyLegalEntity>
        </cac:Party>
    </cac:AccountingSupplierParty>
    

    <cac:AccountingCustomerParty>
        <cac:Party>
            <cbc:EndpointID schemeID="0192">{{clientRegistrationNumber}}</cbc:EndpointID>
            <cac:PartyName>
                <cbc:Name>Name-CP-{{clientRegistrationNumber}}</cbc:Name>
            </cac:PartyName>
            <cac:PostalAddress>
                <cbc:CityName>City ÆØÅ</cbc:CityName>
                <cbc:PostalZone>4321</cbc:PostalZone>
                <cac:Country>
                    <cbc:IdentificationCode>NO</cbc:IdentificationCode>
                </cac:Country>
            </cac:PostalAddress>
            <cac:PartyLegalEntity>
                <cbc:RegistrationName>Legal Buyer Name AS ÆØÅ</cbc:RegistrationName>
                <cbc:CompanyID schemeID="0192">{{clientRegistrationNumber}}</cbc:CompanyID>
            </cac:PartyLegalEntity>
            <cac:Contact>
                <cbc:Name>Test Controller</cbc:Name>
                <cbc:Telephone>88008800</cbc:Telephone>
                <cbc:ElectronicMail>testcontroller@useful.no</cbc:ElectronicMail>
            </cac:Contact>
        </cac:Party>
    </cac:AccountingCustomerParty>


    <cac:Delivery>
        <cac:DeliveryParty>
            <cac:PartyName>
                <cbc:Name>{{name-Delivery}}</cbc:Name>
            </cac:PartyName>
            <cac:DeliveryLocation>
            <cac:Address>
            <cbc:StreetName>{{address1-Delivery}}</cbc:StreetName>
                <cbc:CityName>{{city-Delivery}}</cbc:CityName>
                <cbc:PostalZone>{{zipCode-Delivery}}</cbc:PostalZone>
                <cac:Country>
                    <cbc:IdentificationCode>{{country-Delivery}}</cbc:IdentificationCode>
                </cac:Country>
            </cac:Address>
            </cac:DeliveryLocation>
        </cac:DeliveryParty>
    </cac:Delivery>


    <cac:PaymentMeans>
        <cbc:PaymentMeansCode>31</cbc:PaymentMeansCode>
        <cbc:PaymentID>KidNumber-{{invoiceNumber}}</cbc:PaymentID>
        <cac:PayeeFinancialAccount>
            <cbc:ID >BBAN-{{cSupplierCode-A}}</cbc:ID>
        </cac:PayeeFinancialAccount>
    </cac:PaymentMeans>

    <cac:PaymentTerms>
        <cbc:Note>Payment within 10 days, 2% discount</cbc:Note>
    </cac:PaymentTerms>
    
    <cac:TaxTotal>
        <cbc:TaxAmount currencyID="NOK">25.15</cbc:TaxAmount>
        <cac:TaxSubtotal>
            <cbc:TaxableAmount currencyID="NOK">100.00</cbc:TaxableAmount>
            <cbc:TaxAmount currencyID="NOK">25</cbc:TaxAmount>
            <cac:TaxCategory>
                <cbc:ID>S</cbc:ID>
                <cbc:Percent>25</cbc:Percent>
                <cac:TaxScheme>
                    <cbc:ID>VAT</cbc:ID>
                </cac:TaxScheme>
            </cac:TaxCategory>
        </cac:TaxSubtotal>
        <cac:TaxSubtotal>
            <cbc:TaxableAmount currencyID="NOK">1</cbc:TaxableAmount>
            <cbc:TaxAmount currencyID="NOK">0.15</cbc:TaxAmount>
            <cac:TaxCategory>
                <cbc:ID>S</cbc:ID>
                <cbc:Percent>15</cbc:Percent>
                <cac:TaxScheme>
                    <cbc:ID>VAT</cbc:ID>
                </cac:TaxScheme>
            </cac:TaxCategory>
        </cac:TaxSubtotal>
    </cac:TaxTotal>

    <cac:LegalMonetaryTotal>
        <cbc:LineExtensionAmount currencyID="NOK">101.00</cbc:LineExtensionAmount>
        <cbc:TaxExclusiveAmount currencyID="NOK">101.00</cbc:TaxExclusiveAmount>
        <cbc:TaxInclusiveAmount currencyID="NOK">126.15</cbc:TaxInclusiveAmount>
        <cbc:PayableAmount currencyID="NOK">126.15</cbc:PayableAmount>
    </cac:LegalMonetaryTotal>

    <!-- Line 1 -->
    <cac:InvoiceLine>
        <cbc:ID>1</cbc:ID>
        <cac:InvoicePeriod>
            <cbc:StartDate>2013-06-01</cbc:StartDate>
            <cbc:EndDate>2013-06-30</cbc:EndDate>
        </cac:InvoicePeriod>
        <cac:OrderLineReference>
            <cbc:LineID>1</cbc:LineID>
        </cac:OrderLineReference>
        <cbc:InvoicedQuantity unitCode="NAR">1</cbc:InvoicedQuantity>
        <cbc:LineExtensionAmount currencyID="NOK">1.00</cbc:LineExtensionAmount>
        <cbc:AccountingCost>BookingCode001</cbc:AccountingCost>
        <cac:Item>
            <cbc:Name>Description  {{dateStart}}-{{dateEnd}}</cbc:Name>
            <cac:ClassifiedTaxCategory>
                <cbc:ID >S</cbc:ID>
                <cbc:Percent>15</cbc:Percent>
                <cac:TaxScheme>
                    <cbc:ID>VAT</cbc:ID>
                </cac:TaxScheme>
            </cac:ClassifiedTaxCategory>
        </cac:Item>
        <cac:Price>
            <cbc:PriceAmount currencyID="NOK">1.00</cbc:PriceAmount>
        </cac:Price>
    </cac:InvoiceLine>

    <!-- Line 2 -->
    <cac:InvoiceLine>
        <cbc:ID>2</cbc:ID>
        <cac:InvoicePeriod>
            <cbc:StartDate>2020-12-01</cbc:StartDate>
            <cbc:EndDate>2021-02-28</cbc:EndDate>
        </cac:InvoicePeriod>
        <cac:OrderLineReference>
            <cbc:LineID>2</cbc:LineID>
        </cac:OrderLineReference>
        <cbc:InvoicedQuantity unitCode="NAR">4</cbc:InvoicedQuantity>
        <cbc:LineExtensionAmount currencyID="NOK">100.00</cbc:LineExtensionAmount>
        <cac:Item>
            <cbc:Name>Dimension Value:  {{cDimensionCodeValue-A}}</cbc:Name>
            <cac:ClassifiedTaxCategory>
                <cbc:ID >S</cbc:ID>
                <cbc:Percent>25</cbc:Percent>
                <cac:TaxScheme>
                    <cbc:ID>VAT</cbc:ID>
                </cac:TaxScheme>
            </cac:ClassifiedTaxCategory>
        </cac:Item>
        <cac:Price>
            <cbc:PriceAmount currencyID="NOK">25.00</cbc:PriceAmount>
        </cac:Price>
    </cac:InvoiceLine>
</Invoice>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<CreditNote xmlns:cac="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:CommonAggregateComponents-2"
    xmlns:cbc="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:CommonBasicComponents-2"
    xmlns="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:CreditNote-2">
    <cbc:CustomizationID>urn:cen.eu:en16931:2017#compliant#urn:fdc:peppol.eu:2017:poacc:billing:3.0</cbc:CustomizationID>
    <cbc:ProfileID>urn:fdc:peppol.eu:2017:poacc:billing:01:1.0</cbc:ProfileID>
    <!-- ID has to be unique for every invoice from a given supplier in a client -->
    <cbc:ID>{{invoiceNumber}}</cbc:ID>
    <cbc:IssueDate>2019-01-15</cbc:IssueDate>
    <cbc:DueDate>2019-01-15</cbc:DueDate>
    <!-- comment -->
    <cbc:CreditNoteTypeCode>381</cbc:CreditNoteTypeCode>
    <cbc:DocumentCurrencyCode>NOK</cbc:DocumentCurrencyCode>
    <!-- comment -->
    <cbc:BuyerReference>Test Controller</cbc:BuyerReference>
    <!-- comment -->
    <cac:InvoicePeriod>
        <cbc:StartDate>2020-08-12</cbc:StartDate>
        <cbc:EndDate>2020-08-30</cbc:EndDate>
    </cac:InvoicePeriod>

    <cac:AccountingSupplierParty>
        <cac:Party>
            <cbc:EndpointID schemeID="0192">{{cSupplierCode-A}}</cbc:EndpointID>
            <cac:PartyName>
                <cbc:Name>Heartbeat Test AS æøå</cbc:Name>
            </cac:PartyName>
            <cac:PostalAddress>
                <cbc:CityName>HEARTBEAT CITY ÆØÅ,</cbc:CityName>
                <cbc:PostalZone>1234</cbc:PostalZone>
                <cac:Country>
                    <cbc:IdentificationCode>NO</cbc:IdentificationCode>
                </cac:Country>
            </cac:PostalAddress>
            <cac:PartyTaxScheme>
                <cbc:CompanyID>NO{{cSupplierCode-A}}MVA</cbc:CompanyID>
                <cac:TaxScheme>
                    <cbc:ID>VAT</cbc:ID>
                </cac:TaxScheme>
            </cac:PartyTaxScheme>
            <cac:PartyTaxScheme>
                <cbc:CompanyID>Foretaksregisteret</cbc:CompanyID>
                <cac:TaxScheme>
                    <cbc:ID>TAX</cbc:ID>
                </cac:TaxScheme>
            </cac:PartyTaxScheme>
            <cac:PartyLegalEntity>
                <cbc:RegistrationName>Heartbeat Test AS æøå</cbc:RegistrationName>
                <cbc:CompanyID schemeID="0192">{{cSupplierCode-A}}</cbc:CompanyID>
            </cac:PartyLegalEntity>
        </cac:Party>
    </cac:AccountingSupplierParty>
    
    <cac:AccountingCustomerParty>
        <cac:Party>
            <cbc:EndpointID schemeID="0192">{{clientRegistrationNumber}}</cbc:EndpointID>
            <cac:PartyName>
                <cbc:Name>Buyer Name AS ÆØÅ</cbc:Name>
            </cac:PartyName>
            <cac:PostalAddress>
                <cbc:CityName>City ÆØÅ</cbc:CityName>
                <cbc:PostalZone>4321</cbc:PostalZone>
                <cac:Country>
                    <cbc:IdentificationCode>NO</cbc:IdentificationCode>
                </cac:Country>
            </cac:PostalAddress>
            <cac:PartyLegalEntity>
                <cbc:RegistrationName>Legal Buyer Name AS ÆØÅ</cbc:RegistrationName>
                <cbc:CompanyID schemeID="0192">{{clientRegistrationNumber}}</cbc:CompanyID>
            </cac:PartyLegalEntity>
            <cac:Contact>
                <cbc:Name>Test Controller</cbc:Name>
                <cbc:Telephone>88008800</cbc:Telephone>
                <cbc:ElectronicMail>testcontroller@useful.no</cbc:ElectronicMail>
            </cac:Contact>
        </cac:Party>
    </cac:AccountingCustomerParty>

    <cac:PaymentMeans>
        <cbc:PaymentMeansCode>31</cbc:PaymentMeansCode>
        <cbc:PaymentID>123</cbc:PaymentID>
        <cac:PayeeFinancialAccount>
            <cbc:ID >BBAN-{{cSupplierCode-A}}</cbc:ID>
        </cac:PayeeFinancialAccount>
    </cac:PaymentMeans>

    <cac:PaymentTerms>
        <cbc:Note>Payment within 10 days, 2% discount</cbc:Note>
    </cac:PaymentTerms>
    
    <cac:TaxTotal>
        <cbc:TaxAmount currencyID="NOK">25.15</cbc:TaxAmount>
        <cac:TaxSubtotal>
            <cbc:TaxableAmount currencyID="NOK">100.00</cbc:TaxableAmount>
            <cbc:TaxAmount currencyID="NOK">25</cbc:TaxAmount>
            <cac:TaxCategory>
                <cbc:ID>S</cbc:ID>
                <cbc:Percent>25</cbc:Percent>
                <cac:TaxScheme>
                    <cbc:ID>VAT</cbc:ID>
                </cac:TaxScheme>
            </cac:TaxCategory>
        </cac:TaxSubtotal>
        <cac:TaxSubtotal>
            <cbc:TaxableAmount currencyID="NOK">1</cbc:TaxableAmount>
            <cbc:TaxAmount currencyID="NOK">0.15</cbc:TaxAmount>
            <cac:TaxCategory>
                <cbc:ID>S</cbc:ID>
                <cbc:Percent>15</cbc:Percent>
                <cac:TaxScheme>
                    <cbc:ID>VAT</cbc:ID>
                </cac:TaxScheme>
            </cac:TaxCategory>
        </cac:TaxSubtotal>
    </cac:TaxTotal>

        <cbc:TaxExclusiveAmount currencyID="NOK">101.00</cbc:TaxExclusiveAmount>
        <cbc:TaxInclusiveAmount currencyID="NOK">126.15</cbc:TaxInclusiveAmount>
        <cbc:PayableAmount currencyID="NOK">126.15</cbc:PayableAmount>
    </cac:LegalMonetaryTotal>
    <!-- Line 1 -->
    <cac:CreditNoteLine>
        <cbc:ID>1</cbc:ID>
        <cac:InvoicePeriod>
            <cbc:StartDate>2013-06-01</cbc:StartDate>
            <cbc:EndDate>2013-06-30</cbc:EndDate>
        </cac:InvoicePeriod>

        <cbc:LineExtensionAmount currencyID="NOK">1.00</cbc:LineExtensionAmount>
        <cbc:AccountingCost>BookingCode001</cbc:AccountingCost>
        <cac:InvoicePeriod>
            <cbc:StartDate>2020-08-12</cbc:StartDate>
            <cbc:EndDate>2020-08-30</cbc:EndDate>
        </cac:InvoicePeriod>

            <cbc:Name>Jan-Feb 2020 {{cDimensionCodeValue-A}}</cbc:Name>
            <cac:ClassifiedTaxCategory>
                <cbc:ID >S</cbc:ID>
                <cbc:Percent>15</cbc:Percent>
                <cac:TaxScheme>
                    <cbc:ID>VAT</cbc:ID>
                </cac:TaxScheme>
            </cac:ClassifiedTaxCategory>
        </cac:Item>
        <cac:Price>
            <cbc:PriceAmount currencyID="NOK">1.00</cbc:PriceAmount>
        </cac:Price>
    </cac:CreditNoteLine>
